name: Flip flops with swarovski crystals and studs in your favorite colors.
description: Custom made flip flops with a snakeskin fabric in red, pink, purple, blue or green.  The center concho is available in a heart, berry or cross and adorned with swarovski crystals.  Only the best bling will do.  Available in 1 1/2" or 3" heel heigth.  You will love them!  Great birthday gift for mom, daughter or BFF.
